alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Tallahassee to 10 miles south of St. Marks. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, St. Marks, Wakulla, Ralford Greenway, Newport, Cody, Hells Half Acre, Lamont, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Chaires, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Natural Bridge, Liveoak Island, Apalachee Regional Park and Goose Pasture. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon
